Articles.Content:
Hello there. All over the forum, I've been seeing screenshots of mods that change the look of the universe. I want these mods. Badly. Of course, I'm scared of what they might do to my framerate, but I can always uninstall them. In particular, I want:

*Whatever mod gives you clouds that you can see from the ground

*Whatever mod gives you the awesome galaxy background that's way cooler than the stock skybox

*Whatever mod gives you city lights (not actual cities, I'm not quite that brave yet)

Thanks!

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55905-0-23-5-7-3-EnvironmentalVisualEnhancements-NEW%21-VolumetricClouds%21

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/60961-0-23-5-TextureReplacer-1-4-2-%2816-4-2014%29

You'll probably have to search around for some texture packs and such, but the thread OPs are generally pretty helpful in that regard.

Distant Object Enhancement is another good one to consider:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/69907-0-23-Distant-Object-Enhancement-v1-3-Planets-satellites-in-the-night-sky!-(3-3)

Distant Object Enhancement is another good one to consider:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/69907-0-23-Distant-Object-Enhancement-v1-3-Planets-satellites-in-the-night-sky!-(3-3)

So you can see your space station from the ground? Cool!
